long_name: Sensible Heat Flux at Lake-Atmosphere Interface
resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: At the surface of the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards.

long_name: Latent Heat Flux at Lake-Atmosphere Interface
resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards.

resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards.

long_name: Upward Short-Wave Radiation Flux at Lake-Atmosphere Interface
resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards. Not to be confused with net shortwave radiation.

long_name: Upward Long-Wave Radiation Flux at Lake-Atmosphere Interface
resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards. Not to be confused with net longwave radiation.

long_name: Downward Heat Flux at Lake-Atmosphere Interface
resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards. the residual term of the surface energy balance, i.e. the net amount of energy that enters the lake on daily time scale: lakeheatf = swdown - swup + lwdown - lwup - sensheatf - latenheatf (terms defined positive when directed upwards)

resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Only if computed by the model.

resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: Only to be reported for global models, local models should use extcoeff as input.

long_name: Sediment Upward Heat Flux at Lake-Sediment Interface
resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
comment: Positive if upwards. Only if computed by the model.
